summary: The client requested the creation of Sprint Planning 1 (SP-1) focusing on login, employee entry, and search features. The Sprint Planning Architect analyzed the backlog and proposed SP-001 including user stories US-010, US-015, and US-001 for foundational employee directory functionality, seeking approval or tweaks.

actions.task: Review and approve or provide tweaks to proposed SP-001

backlog_deltas.title: Sprint with stories US-010 (Mock Login), US-015 (Add Employee Profile), US-001 (Employee Directory Search)

risks.risk: Dependencies on global setup like US-016 could potentially block progress
risks.mitigation: Assume global setup is available and not blocking; focus on minimal dependencies for quick execution
